name: network-proxy
title: Network Proxy
description: View and manage network proxy settings on macOS
author: wuyuxiangX

commands.name: show-network-proxy
commands.title: Show Network Proxy
commands.description: Display current network proxy settings in a list view

commands.name: manage-proxy-templates
commands.title: Manage Proxy Templates
commands.description: Create, edit, and apply proxy configuration templates

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
